page.title: 15THE NICHOLLS
page.content: Hayley Nicholls wrote of the life of her mum on a quiet hill farm. She does not drive a car so the amount she gets out is limited. She has a grown up family of three boys and one girl living at home, this takes up much of her time. She works an 18 hour day, beginning at 6 AM. She likes to sew in her spare time. Most of her time is spent at home on the 200 acre farm which has at least 700 sheep and 65 cows. Some of her day is spent outside helping with sheep and chickens. Mr Nicholls not only farms but enjoys fishing and motorbike scrambling with his sons. It is difficult for the whole family to go on holiday together because someone has to stay behind to look after the farm and the animals.
